summary: This document is a set of 30-minute inmate observation check sheets from the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated July 24-25, 2019. The sheets record staff checks on inmates in continuous locked-down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, and were reviewed by lieutenants and a captain. This is a standard prison operational log.
keyFacts: The document consists of 30-minute inmate observation check sheets from the MCC New York Special Housing Unit for July 24-25, 2019.
The sheets document that inmates in continuous locked-down status (administrative detention or disciplinary segregation) must be observed at least twice per hour on an irregular schedule.
The check sheets were reviewed by a Morning Watch Lieutenant and a Captain, indicating standard prison operational oversight.
No specific inmate or staff names are legibly recorded in the provided text excerpts; the fields contain signatures or initials that are not clearly decipherable names.
